title: Packed Drinking Water in Glass Bottle — Product & Order Management App

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that manages a product catalog of packed drinking water glass bottle products, each with fields: id, name, description, volume (ml), pricePerUnit, stockQuantity, and isAvailable. Provide functions to add, update, delete, and list products.

quotes: packed drinking water in glass bottle

acceptanceCriteria: Products can be created with all required fields.
Products can be retrieved as a list.
Products can be updated (price, stock, availability).
Products can be deleted by ID.

requirements.text: Create a backend order management system. Each order includes: orderId, customerName, customerContact, items (array of productId + quantity), totalPrice, status (pending/confirmed/delivered/cancelled), and createdAt timestamp. Provide functions to place an order, update order status, and list all orders.

quotes: packed drinking water in glass bottle

acceptanceCriteria: A new order can be placed referencing existing products.
Stock quantity decreases when an order is placed.
Order status can be updated.
All orders can be listed and filtered by status.

requirements.text: Build a frontend product catalog page that displays all available packed drinking water glass bottle products in a card grid. Each card shows the bottle image, name, volume, price, and stock level with an 'Add to Order' button.

quotes: packed drinking water in glass bottle

acceptanceCriteria: Product cards render for all available products.
Each card shows name, volume, price per unit, and stock level.
Out-of-stock products are visually indicated as unavailable.
Clicking 'Add to Order' adds the item to the current order draft.

requirements.text: Build a frontend order placement flow with a cart/order summary panel. Users can adjust quantities, enter customer name and contact, and submit the order. Show a success confirmation after placement.

quotes: packed drinking water in glass bottle

acceptanceCriteria: Cart shows selected products, quantities, and computed total price.
Quantities can be increased, decreased, or removed.
Customer name and contact fields are required before submission.
Successful order submission shows a confirmation message with the order ID.

requirements.text: Build a frontend admin dashboard with two tabs: Products (add/edit/delete products and manage stock) and Orders (list all orders, filter by status, and update order status). Protect admin actions with a simple admin mode toggle.

quotes: packed drinking water in glass bottle

acceptanceCriteria: Products tab allows adding a new product via a form.
Existing products can be edited and deleted.
Orders tab lists all orders with status badges.
Order status can be updated from the orders list.
Admin mode toggle gates access to the dashboard.

requirements.text: Apply a clean, fresh visual theme inspired by pure water and glass — use a crisp white and light aqua/teal color palette, minimal sans-serif typography, soft shadows, and subtle glass-like card effects. Maintain this theme consistently across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette of white, light aqua, and teal accents.
Typography is clean and modern throughout.
Cards and modals use subtle glass-like styling (light transparency, soft borders).
No inconsistent or clashing color blocks across pages.

requirements.text: Render the generated product hero image and bottle illustration as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them on the landing/product pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero banner image is displayed on the landing/product catalog page.
Glass bottle illustration appears on product cards.

constraints: All backend logic must reside in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not use any external database or cloud service.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: User authentication or Internet Identity login.
Real-time order tracking or push notifications.

required: Bright hero banner with clear glass water bottles arranged neatly on a white surface with light aqua water droplets and subtle light reflections (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Single clear glass water bottle with clean label, crisp water inside, on a white background with soft shadow (bottle-illustration.dim_400x400.png)
